sections.text:
USER EXPERIENCE DESIGNER AND RESEARCHER 
18/02/1992 | corinneschillizzi@gmail.com | +39 3298869484 | PORTFOLIO

WORK EXPERIENCE 
Qualitative research Storyboarding Wireframing Prototyping Usability testing Heuristic evaluation Facilitating workshops 
TOOLS 
Sketch Invision Keynote Proto.io HTML & CSS 
UX & Service Designer - NTTData (Milan, Italy) 03/2018 – today 
- Increased Telepass' project team awareness about user's needs by doing qualitative research, and defining design requirements and user flows. 
- Designed a new BCC mobile banking application. Increased user engagement by 35% by defining the app Information Architecture and interaction patterns. 
- Redesigned 4Store, a web management system for accessing supermarket data, simplifying user's workflows by introducing interaction patterns. 
- Managed AIDA, an Artificial Intelligence R&D project by leading 
a 
group composed of designers, developers and AI experts. Web Designer - Babotel (Milan, Italy) 01/2018 - 03/2018 Designed and developed web contents, facilitating user access to the agency client's products by touchpoints design. UX Designer - Octonet (Milan, Italy) 09/2017 - 12/2017 Designed and developed web-sites, facilitating user access to client's products by experience and interface design.

LEADERSHIP & AWARDS 
UNESCO Mobile Learning Week - Paris 2020 Selected as one of the 10 participants on 270 applicants for the innovation day with the project AIDA, for designing an inclusive learning application. 
Service Design Fringe Festival - London 2019 Selected as one on 26 speakers at the event to talk about my experience designing Artificial Intelligence application through human centred design approach.

ACADEMIC EXPERIENCES 
User Researcher - Lab. ITIS (Innovative Technologies for Interaction and Services) - UNIMIB 2017 - 2018 
Executed a research activity about machine-generated music, from an explorative user research phase on musicians' acceptance of AI-generated music to the Deep Learning model and product design. Listen to experiments at https://corinne.solutions.

EDUCATION 
Master Degree UNIMIB 2015 - 2017 110/110 cum laude Bachelor Degree UNIPA 2011 - 2014 110/110
